posts.post_content:
Range from Poor to Good condition; all Sovereign 150 and 350.   Asking $200 delivered; paypal preferred:
Jack Barry
Bob Bescher (Portrait)
Peter Cassidy
Bunk Congalton
Billy Gilbert
Wilbur Goode
Rudy Hulswitt
Otto Knabe
George Perring
Billy Purtell
Lee Tannehill (L. Tannehill On Front)
Heinie Zimmermann
Interested in the Bescher if you decide to break up the lot.  Otherwise, good luck with the sale.
